SQLSCRIPT.INSERTQUERY: CREATE INDEX IDX_EUG_UGID ON ENTREZ_UNIGENE(EUG_UGID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_EUG_GENEID ON ENTREZ_UNIGENE(EUG_GENEID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_UEX_UGID ON UG_EXPRESS(UEX_UGID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_UEX_TISSUEID ON UG_EXPRESS(UEX_TISSUEID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE TABLE TISSUE_EXPRESSION_U ( GTE_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,GTE_STD_TERMID VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

insert into TISSUE_EXPRESSION_U Select DISTINCT ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID,SYSTEM_TERMDATA.STD_TERMID from ENTREZGENE,SYSTEM_TERMDATA,UG_EXPRESS,ENTREZ_UNIGENE where ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = ENTREZ_UNIGENE.EUG_GENEID and SYSTEM_TERMDATA.STD_TERMID = UG_EXPRESS.UEX_TISSUEID and UG_EXPRESS.UEX_UGID = ENTREZ_UNIGENE.EUG_UGID
DROP INDEX IDX_EUG_UGID
DROP INDEX IDX_EUG_GENEID
DROP INDEX IDX_UEX_UGID
DROP INDEX IDX_UEX_TISSUEID
CREATE TABLE FE_UNIGENE_U (FEU_UGID VARCHAR2(23) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
Insert into FE_UNIGENE_U Select DISTINCT ENTREZ_UNIGENE.EUG_UGID from ENTREZ_UNIGENE,ENTREZGENE WHERE ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = ENTREZ_UNIGENE.EUG_GENEID
alter table FE_UNIGENE_U ADD(FEU_ID NUMBER(12))
CREATE SEQUENCE FE_UNIGENE_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE
UPDATE FE_UNIGENE_U SET FEU_ID = FE_UNIGENE_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL
CREATE TABLE FE_UNIGENE_ENTREZGENE_U (FE_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,FE_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

insert into FE_UNIGENE_ENTREZGENE_U Select FE_UNIGENE_U.FEU_ID,ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID from ENTREZGENE,FE_UNIGENE_U,ENTREZ_UNIGENE where ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = ENTREZ_UNIGENE.EUG_GENEID and ENTREZ_UNIGENE.EUG_UGID = FE_UNIGENE_U.FEU_UGID
CREATE TABLE PROBESET_U (PROBESET VARCHAR2(35) NOT NULL ,PRB_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(2048)) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
insert into PROBESET_U Select DISTINCT CHIPDESCRIPTION.CDE_PROBESET,CHIPDESCRIPTION.CDE_CHIP_DESCRIPTION from CHIPDESCRIPTION
create sequence PROBESET_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE
ALTER TABLE PROBESET_U ADD (PRB_ID NUMBER(12))
UPDATE PROBESET_U SET PRB_ID = PROBESET_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL
CREATE TABLE GENE_PROBESET_U (GPB_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,GPB_PRB_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

Insert into GENE_PROBESET_U Select distinct ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID,PROBESET_U.PRB_ID from ENTREZGENE,PROBESET_U,CHIPDESCRIPTION where ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = CHIPDESCRIPTION.CDE_GENEID and CHIPDESCRIPTION.CDE_PROBESET = PROBESET_U.PROBESET
CREATE SEQUENCE ACCESSION_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE
CREATE INDEX IDX_FE_GENEID ON FE_UNIGENE_ENTREZGENE_U(FE_GENEID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_USE_UGID ON UG_SEQUENCE(USE_UGID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_FEU_UGID ON FE_UNIGENE_U(FEU_UGID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_GPB_GENEID ON GENE_PROBESET_U(GPB_GENEID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
DROP TABLE ACC_TMP1
DROP TABLE ACC_TMP2
CREATE TABLE ACC_TMP1 AS (SELECT FEU_ID,USE_ACC_NO FROM UG_SEQUENCE, FE_UNIGENE_U WHERE UG_SEQUENCE.USE_UGID = FE_UNIGENE_U.FEU_UGID)
CREATE TABLE ACC_TMP2 AS (SELECT ACC_TMP1.FEU_ID,USE_ACC_NO,FE_GENEID FROM ACC_TMP1,FE_UNIGENE_ENTREZGENE_U WHERE ACC_TMP1.FEU_ID = FE_UNIGENE_ENTREZGENE_U.FE_ID)

CREATE TABLE ACCESSION_U (GAC_ACC_ID NOT NULL,GAC_ACC_NO NOT NULL, GAC_PRB_ID NOT NULL,GAC_FEU_ID NOT NULL) AS (SELECT ACCESSION_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL,USE_ACC_NO,GPB_PRB_ID,FEU_ID FROM ACC_TMP2,GENE_PROBESET_U WHERE ACC_TMP2.FE_GENEID = GENE_PROBESET_U.GPB_GENEID)
DROP TABLE ACC_TMP1
DROP TABLE ACC_TMP2
DROP INDEX IDX_FE_GENEID
DROP INDEX IDX_USE_UGID
DROP INDEX IDX_FEU_UGID
DROP INDEX IDX_GPB_GENEID
CREATE TABLE MICROARRAY_U (MARRAY_ID NUMBER(4) NOT NULL, MARRAY_NAME VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,MARRAY_LOCAL_TAXID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
insert into MICROARRAY_U Select distinct CTY_CHIPTYPEID,CTY_CHIPNAME,OTM_LOCAL_TAXID from CHIPTYPES,ORGANISM_TAXONOMYMAP where UPPER(CTY_SPECIES)=UPPER(OTM_ORGNAME)
CREATE TABLE PROBESET_MICROARRAY_U (PMR_MARRAY_ID NUMBER(4) NOT NULL,PMR_PRB_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

insert into PROBESET_MICROARRAY_U Select MICROARRAY_U.MARRAY_ID,PROBESET_U.PRB_ID from MICROARRAY_U,PROBESET_U,CHIPDESCRIPTION where MICROARRAY_U.MARRAY_ID = CHIPDESCRIPTION.CDE_CHIPTYPEID and PROBESET_U.PROBESET = CHIPDESCRIPTION.CDE_PROBESET
CREATE TABLE SNPDATA_U ( SNP_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,SNP_SNPID NUMBER (12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
insert into SNPDATA_U Select ENTREZ_SNP.ESN_GENEID,ENTREZ_SNP.ESN_SNPID from ENTREZ_SNP,ENTREZGENE where ENTREZ_SNP.ESN_GENEID = ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID
CREATE TABLE STSDATA_U (STSID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
Insert into STSDATA_U Select distinct EST_STSID from ENTREZ_STS
CREATE TABLE GENE_STSDATA_U (GST_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL,GST_STSID NUMBER (10) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

insert into GENE_STSDATA_U Select ENTREZ_STS.EST_GENEID,ENTREZ_STS.EST_STSID from ENTREZ_STS,STSDATA_U,ENTREZGENE where ENTREZ_STS.EST_GENEID = ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID and ENTREZ_STS.EST_STSID = STSDATA_U.STSID
CREATE TABLE PHENOTYPE_U (PHENOTYPE VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
Insert into PHENOTYPE_U Select distinct ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE.EPH_PHENOTYPE from ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE
create sequence PHENOTYPE_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE
ALTER TABLE PHENOTYPE_U ADD (PHE_ID NUMBER(12))
UPDATE PHENOTYPE_U SET PHE_ID = PHENOTYPE_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL
CREATE TABLE GENE_PHENOTYPE_U (GPH_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,GPH_PHE_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

insert into GENE_PHENOTYPE_U Select ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID,PHENOTYPE_U.PHE_ID from ENTREZGENE, PHENOTYPE_U, ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE where ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE.EPH_GENEID and ENTREZ_PHENOTYPE.EPH_PHENOTYPE = PHENOTYPE_U.PHENOTYPE
CREATE TABLE GENE_GOTERM_U (GOT_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,GOT_STD_TERMID VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL ) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

insert into GENE_GOTERM_U Select ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID,SYSTEM_TERMDATA.STD_TERMID from ENTREZGENE,SYSTEM_TERMDATA,ENTREZ_GOID where ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = ENTREZ_GOID.EGO_GENEID and SYSTEM_TERMDATA.STD_TERMID = ENTREZ_GOID.EGO_GOID
CREATE TABLE CHROMOSOME_U (CHROMOSOME VARCHAR2(30) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
INSERT INTO CHROMOSOME_U Select distinct EGE_CHROMOSOME from ENTREZGENE WHERE EGE_CHROMOSOME IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE CHROMOSOME_U ADD(cHR_ID NUMBER(12))
CREATE SEQUENCE CHROMOSOME_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE
UPDATE CHROMOSOME_U SET cHR_ID = CHROMOSOME_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL
CREATE INDEX IDX_GPW_FROMGENEID ON GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS(GPW_FROMGENEID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE TABLE LITERATURE_U ( LIT_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL,LIT_FROM_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL, LIT_TO_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,LIT_CORRELATION VARCHAR2(165) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE SEQUENCE LITERATURE_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE

INSERT INTO LITERATURE_U SELECT LITERATURE_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL,GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS.GPW_FROMGENEID,GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS.GPW_TOGENEID, to_char((POWER(GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS.GPW_WEIGHT,2)/(GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS.GPW_FROMPUBCT*GPW_TOPUBCT))) FROM GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS,ENTREZGENE where GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS.GPW_FROMGENEID = ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID
DROP INDEX IDX_GPW_FROMGENEID
CREATE TABLE GENE_LITERATURE_U ( GLT_EGE_GENEID NUMBER (12) NOT NULL,GLT_LIT_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
insert into GENE_LITERATURE_U Select ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID,LITERATURE_U.LIT_ID from ENTREZGENE,LITERATURE_U where ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID = LITERATURE_U.LIT_FROM_GENEID
CREATE TABLE PROBESET_PROBESET_U (GPB_PRB_ID1 NUMBER(12),GPB_PRB_ID2 NUMBER(12)) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_HGE_GENEID1 ON HOMOLOGENE(HGE_GENEID1) TABLESPACE REFDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_HGE_GENEID2 ON HOMOLOGENE(HGE_GENEID2) TABLESPACE REFDATA
CREATE INDEX IDX_GPB_GENEID ON GENE_PROBESET_U(GPB_GENEID) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

INSERT INTO PROBESET_PROBESET_U ( SELECT DISTINCT A.GPB_PRB_ID,B.GPB_PRB_ID FROM HOMOLOGENE, GENE_PROBESET_U A, GENE_PROBESET_U B WHERE HOMOLOGENE.HGE_GENEID1=A.GPB_GENEID AND HOMOLOGENE.HGE_GENEID2=B.GPB_GENEID )
DROP INDEX IDX_HGE_GENEID1
DROP INDEX IDX_HGE_GENEID2
DROP INDEX IDX_GPB_GENEID

CREATE TABLE GENEVERSION_U ( GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL ,ENTREZ_VERSION VARCHAR2(30), UNIGENE_VERSION VARCHAR2(30),UNI_STS_VERSION VARCHAR2(30),GO_VERSION VARCHAR2(30), HML_VERSION VARCHAR2(30),PUBMED_VERSION VARCHAR2(30),DBSNP_VERSION VARCHAR2(30),TAX_VERSION VARCHAR2(30),EGE_GENE_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
CREATE SEQUENCE GENEVERSION_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE

INSERT INTO GENEVERSION_U (SELECT GENEVERSION_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, RVH_ENTREZ_VERSION, RVH_UNIGENE_VERSION, RVH_UNI_STS_VERSION, RVH_GO_VERSION, RVH_HML_VERSION, '1.0', RVH_DBSNP_VERSION, RVH_TAX_VERSION,ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID FROM ENTREZGENE,REVISION_HISTORY WHERE REVISION_HISTORY.RVH_LOCAL_TAXID=ENTREZGENE.EGE_LOCAL_TAXID)
CREATE TABLE FE_HOMOLOGENE_U (HML_ID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL,HGE_GENEID1 NUMBER(12),HGE_GENEID2 NUMBER(12),HGE_ALIGNMENT NUMBER(6,2),HGE_RECIPROCAL CHAR(1))
CREATE SEQUENCE FE_HOMOLOGENE_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 999999999999 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE

INSERT INTO FE_HOMOLOGENE_U SELECT FE_HOMOLOGENE_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL,HGE_GENEID1,HGE_GENEID2,HGE_ALIGNMENT,HGE_RECIPROCAL FROM HOMOLOGENE,ENTREZGENE A,ENTREZGENE B WHERE A.EGE_GENEID=HGE_GENEID1 AND B.EGE_GENEID=HGE_GENEID2
CREATE TABLE FE_OMIM_U ( OMIM_ID NUMBER(8) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA
insert into FE_OMIM_U Select distinct ENTREZ_OMIM.EOM_OMIM from ENTREZ_OMIM
CREATE TABLE GENE_OMIM_U (GOM_OMIM_ID NUMBER(8) NOT NULL,GOM_GENEID NUMBER(12) NOT NULL) TABLESPACE CACOREDATA

Insert into GENE_OMIM_U Select FE_OMIM_U.OMIM_ID,ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID from FE_OMIM_U,ENTREZ_OMIM,ENTREZGENE where FE_OMIM_U.OMIM_ID = ENTREZ_OMIM.EOM_OMIM and ENTREZ_OMIM.EOM_GENEID = ENTREZGENE.EGE_GENEID
create table FE_ENTREZGENE_U as (select * from ENTREZGENE)
ALTER TABLE FE_ENTREZGENE_U ADD( EGE_CHR_ID NUMBER(12), EGE_PUBMED_CT NUMBER(12))
UPDATE FE_ENTREZGENE_U e SET e.EGE_CHR_ID = (select c.CHR_ID from CHROMOSOME_U c WHERE e.EGE_CHROMOSOME = c.CHROMOSOME)
UPDATE FE_ENTREZGENE_U e SET e.EGE_PUBMED_CT = (select distinct GPW_FROMPUBCT from GENE_PMID_WEIGHTS P WHERE e.EGE_GENEID = P.GPW_FROMGENEID)
create table FE_SYSTEM_TERMDATA_U as (select * from SYSTEM_TERMDATA)
CREATE TABLE ENTREZGENE_HOMOLOGENE_U(HGE_GENEID NOT NULL, HML_ID NOT NULL) AS (SELECT DISTINCT HGE_GENEID1,HML_ID FROM FE_HOMOLOGENE_U)
